TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AnalyzerConfig extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a single EditorConfig file, see http://editorconfig.org for details about the format.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.AnalyzerConfig Parse (Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Text.SourceText text, string pathToFile);

Docs.summary: Parses an editor config file text located at the given path. No parsing errors are reported. If any line contains a parse error, it is dropped.

Docs.summary: Parses an editor config file text located at the given path. No parsing errors are reported. If any line contains a parse error, it is dropped.
